intro.p_title: SK Chemicals always looks <br class='pc_only'/> for ways to make better pharmaceutical products

1.title: Overview
1.description: R&D is the source of competitiveness for pharmaceutical companies. As such, SK Chemicals has committed its research capabilities in developing pharmaceutical products with global competitiveness. SK Chemicals Research Center holds outstanding competencies and expertise across all stages of pharmaceutical R&D including drug formulations research, analytical research, process development and manufacturing of various dosage forms.

2.title: Quality by Design
2.description: R&D is the source of competitiveness for pharmaceutical companies. As such, SK Chemicals has committed its research capabilities in developing pharmaceutical products with global competitiveness. SK Chemicals Central Research Center holds outstanding competencies and expertise across all stages of pharmaceutical R&D including drug formulations research, analytical research, process development and manufacturing of various dosage forms.

3.title: Key Areas

li_title.2: The purpose of collection and use of personal information
li_title.3: Period of possession and use of personal information

li_txt.1:
We collect your personal information for user sign up, customer consultations, and service requests.
  • Personal information : email address, and contact information
  • Means of collection : our website (Ask a Question)
li_txt.2:
We use our customers' personal information for the purposes stated below.
  • Management
  • To handle customer complaints and feedback
li_txt.3: Your personal information will be destroyed without exception or delay after our customer support team achieves the purpose for which the information was collected and used.
